channel.title: Comments for page "Pinky Lvl. 3"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pinky Lvl. 3"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: when wkais only started and LOTS of ninja tried combos on FEW wkais, diffculty rised very FAST from combo to another harder one, I got pinky 3 at 5th-7th mastery by doing it from 1-3 attempts when I was allowed to do 5-7 or so to get this 50% attack bonus :) Soooo… This was like true MASTERY (luck?) that's why she leveled faster in harder way :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I don't think so. I have gotten her several times off the difficulty level up, and I still have to do it every time. At least until I get up to 21 masteries.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm, not sure if I just happened to have 19 masteries or something, but I got her with a turn one mastery in S10…then speedlooped, got one mastery, and got her again. It may be that you just need one mastery if you've gotten her at all, regardless of method? Dunno…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
there's two ways to get Pinky 3. the first and more common is to acquire 20+ masteries since the masteries loop and you only need one mastery to get her (get 21 masteries total for season 3. then after looping to season 4, you'd still have 21 masteries and would only need to get 1 to level her as that would be your 22nd mastery.) the other harder way is to get the difficulty or under. (difficulty is 3 and you get it right in your second try)

hope that clears things up.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
I just completed my first mastery (in 2 attempts out of 3) and pinky didn't level. She wasn't in my team as it specifically said she doesn't need to be.
The text of this page might need some clarification cause right now its confusing as hell.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Well it's worth doing if you don't use the GM script that currently exists that can help get you mastery in under the difficulty.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I would assume you would need to be a special jonin, as that is when you get pinky lvl 2. And the 20+ masteries thing isn't a change. It's an addition. Basically, once you've gotten 20+ masteries of *any* level under your (k-)belt, each season, you would just need to do one mastery at any level to reobtain her. Which would make it easier, actually. You could do one mastery per day, for, what, 30 stamina max? Even as a chunin, I'd say that's worth doing, if only to speed things along once you're ready for WK proper.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: No. I just got her as a Special Jonin.

item.title: Jonin
item.content:encoded: Do you have to be a jonin to obtain pinky level 3
